@ Reviewer

Well said man, well said.

These comments on this torrent are rather sad. If you had a choice between dubbed or subtitled, why would you want to watch the dubbed version to begin with? When you watch a movie that's been dubbed, you lose much of the feeling in the acting. Most of the time the voice actors that do the dubbing never really catch the emotion that the original actors were trying to portray and not to mention, a lot of the story is lost in translation due to the fact that they have to alter the lines in order to say them fast enough in place with whatever is being said. If you can't watch a movie just because it has subtitles then you either need to finish school or need to think about trying to get your G.E.D. As for blaming Americans for being ignorant... Trust me, that's not the case. Stupidity comes in all colors and places.
